backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files used as reference documentation.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no styles defined.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component wrapping GameRoot in a fullscreen container.
frontend/src/game/engine/collision.ts: Implements hitbox overlap checks and generates fighter and attack hitboxes.
frontend/src/game/engine/constants.ts: Defines gameplay constants for physics, arena bounds, attacks, and initial fighter state.
frontend/src/game/engine/simulation.ts: Runs per-frame game simulation including movement, attacks, hit detection, and state updates.
frontend/src/game/engine/types.ts: Type definitions for vectors, hitboxes, attacks, fighters, and global game state.
frontend/src/game/engine/useGameLoop.ts: React hook running a 60 FPS loop, processing input, simulating frames, and detecting game over.
frontend/src/game/GameRoot.tsx: Controls game screens, manages game state transitions, and renders Stage, HUD, and overlays.
frontend/src/game/input/keybindings.ts: Keyboard mappings for both players and the pause key.
frontend/src/game/input/useKeyboard.ts: Tracks real-time keyboard state for both players and detects pause presses.
frontend/src/game/render/assets.ts: Defines asset paths and provides a preload function that loads all images.
frontend/src/game/render/FighterSprite.t: Renders a fighter sprite with animations, positioning, and attack indicators based on fighter state.
frontend/src/game/render/Stage.tsx: Displays the game stage background and renders both fighters within the arena.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsOverlay.tsx: Shows a modal overlay listing control bindings for both players with a close button.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverScreen.tsx: Displays the winner and a restart option with visual effects and footer branding.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Renders player health bars and a center fight indicator based on current game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseOverlay.tsx: Shows a pause menu overlay with resume instructions and a resume button.
frontend/src/game/ui/StartScreen.tsx: Provides the start menu with options to begin the game or view controls, plus footer branding.
frontend/src/game/ui/uiClasses.ts: Exports shared UI class strings for consistent arcade-style styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading with context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, arcade-styled fonts, and custom glow/neon utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, image requirements, and pending requests for the Sonic/Tails-inspired fighting game.
